text_ruling: Midori can only be used at timing structure of a run 2. [Official FAQ]

Ice that is swapped is installed, but the install cost of the ice being
swapped does not have to be paid. [Official FAQ]

If the Runner exposes an ice with [Snitch](/en/card/02045), Midori can still swap the
ice unless the Runner jacks out with Snitch. [Official FAQ]

Midori must already be rezzed before the run in order to use her on
the first piece of ice protecting the server. [Official FAQ]
Ice installed with Midori can be rezzed with the [Amazon Industrial Zone](/en/card/02038). [Official FAQ]
